belongs_to_collection.name: Aku Tahu Kapan Kamu Mati - Collection

original_title: Aku Tahu Kapan Kamu Mati: Suicide Village
overview: This sequel takes place four years after the ending of the first film. Where Siena is experiencing depression due to being able to see someone's death sign. Even in this situation, she tries to help the people of Remetuk Village who are shrouded in a suicide mystery.
title: I Know When You Are Going to Die: Suicide Village
